ChestBBInclineBenchPress.name: Barbell Incline Bench Press
ChestBBInclineBenchPress.preparation: Lie supine on incline bench. Dismount barbell from rack over upper chest using wide oblique overhand grip.
ChestBBInclineBenchPress.execution: Lower weight to upper chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.
ChestBBInclineBenchPress.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Also see Bench Press Analysis.
